text:
@DanScavino @realDonaldTrump Trump’s arrogant ineptitude made Coronavirus crisis worse. His lack of preparedness & slow response put Americans at greater risk.
Look at numbers & trend lines from Japan & S Korea compared to the US. Those countries prepared for the coming storm, Trump denied the threat.

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
